name: moped
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small motorcycle with pedals (= parts that you press with your feet to move forward) that can be used when starting it or travelling up a hill

Add to word list
a small two-wheeled vehicle with a motor and pedals like those on a bicycle, which can be used when starting it or traveling up a hill
